message: Starting inventory of state_db.py SQLite functions for review flow migration
Read state_db.py (1792 lines). Analyzing review-related functions and schema.

COMPLETED: Comprehensive inventory of state_db.py SQLite functions for review flow migration. Documented all existing functions (update_phase_status, create_review, update_review, record_agent_finding, get_agent_findings, create_handover, get_latest_handover) with signatures, thread safety, and usage locations. Identified that update_phase_status() is the critical missing piece - must be called to persist phase status changes to SQLite. Provided implementation checklist with specific line numbers and testing criteria. Findings include: (1) Complete schema documentation for reviews, agent_findings, handovers tables (2) Solution path using existing functions (3) Additional review.py module requiring audit (4) Implementation checklist with backward compatibility notes.
